title: Publication: Modeling Contraceptive Use Among University Students
content: In 2025, I completed my thesis on contraceptive use among university students using binary logistic regression, focusing on Mzuzu University. Download Thesis PDF

title: International Youth Mathematics Challenge
content: I participated in the International Youth Mathematics Challenge and earned a certificate for my performance. Download Certificate

title: Monitoring and Evaluation Dashboard
content: I developed a Monitoring and Evaluation dashboard using Excel to track project progress and key performance indicators effectively.

title: Graduation from Mzuzu University
content: I graduated on 9th January 2026 with a Bachelor of Science in Mathematical Sciences (Upper Second Class Honours) from Mzuzu University. Download CV

title: Forecasting Under-Five Mortality in Malawi
content: I am currently working on projects to forecast under-five mortality rate in Malawi using machine learning models and classical time series models, highlighting implications for SDG 3.2.
